Class enemybullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • TC.enemybullet

  • public class enemybullet
extends java.lang.Object
    An enemy can shoot the player using an enemy bullet.
    Version:
    3/6/15
    Author:
    UCSB-CS48-W15-G08
